segments.advisor_message: Hey there! So, what are some of the goals or topics you really wanna talk about today? Just laying it all out there, ya know?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah! I was thinkin' like maybe investments? I kinda wanna look into, uh, some retirement stuff too? That, and I guess, like, saving for a house would be cool!

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So investments, retirement, and, uh, saving for a house. That sounds super important. Anything else on your mind?
segments.client_message: Oh, also, I think maybe like, uh, planning for my kids' education would be a good thing to chat about, too. Sorta all about the future, huh?

segments.advisor_message: Definitely, planning for your kids' education is really smart! Let's make sure we cover that as well. What about any other sources or info you've come across that you wanna share?
segments.client_message: Um, well, I looked at some online stuff but it’s kinda all over the place, honestly. I think I just need a bit of guidance to, like, clear up the confusion?
